Wouldn't the *king* refer to Alduin, who was sundered atop the throat. Alduin, was the king of dragons (in a way), the Nords challenged his reign there. Bleeding, most likely refers to the broken time there, kind of like it's seeping out, seeing as it's called the time *wound* this somewhat substantiates this notion. All in all, I think it quite clearly represents the throat of the world.
